item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.8 (Monday 24th Special)
item.description:
Yo, Here is this week's podcast my homeboy's. Tis pimpin tunes from da ghetto wit extra ghetto music for ya
LUFT POST!!!
1. A Dozen Furies - The Cycle (3:27) 2. 36 Crazyfists - I'll Go Until My Heart Stops (3:50) 3. Drop Dead, Gorgeous - E.R. (2:26) 4. Horse The Band - Bunnies (3:33) 5. Ella - Ghost In The Machine (5:05) 6. Casey Jones - Pain 101 (3:25) 7. Shadows Fall - What Drives the Weak (4:43)
item.dc:creator: Luke Beard

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.7 (Easter Special)
item.description:
This is a cool beans ep, 9 times tables , cowboys ,quiz , socks ,
1. Parkway Drive - Romance Is Dead (5:18) 2. Job For A Cowboy - Entombment of a Machine (4:11) 3. Circa Survive - Act Appalled (3:23) 4. Kingdom Of Sorrow - Buried In Black (4:05) 5. MC Lars - If I Had A Time Machine, The World Would Be Fresh (1:03) 6. Blessed By A Broken Heart - Mic Skillz (3:15) 7. One Indiscretion - More Hero Than Villian (4:01)

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.6 (Metallica Dedicated Special )
item.description:
Law - This be arr podcast of the week me hearties and it be a tribute to 'tallica as those buccaneers are having thar 20th anniversary of Master of puppets, arrr. You better enjoy tharr podcast or i'll shiver yarr timbers.
1. Metallica - Battery (5:08) 2. Maroon - Wake up in hell (3:54) 3. Demon Hunter - Through The Black (4:27) 4. Himsa - Girl In Glass (Live) (6:46) 5. Every Time I Die - Ebolarma (2:58) 6. Full Blown Chaos - Judged (2:52) 7. Thursday - Counting 5-4-3-2-1 (3:07) 8. Metallica - Master of Puppets (8:29)
item.dc:creator: Luke Beard

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.5 (Ginger Martin Special)
item.description:
Gingert martin special this week enjoy
1. Dead to Fall - Heroes (All of My Heroes Have Failed Me) (3:25) 2. Andrew WK - She Is Beautiful (3:33) 3. God Forbid - To The Fallen Hero (4:42) 4. Sweet Emotion - City Lights (4:57) 5. Sum 41 - Pain for Pleasure (1:42) 6. xBISHOPx - XBishopX Basically Owns Your Face (2:24) 7. Calico System - Running With Scissors (3:08)

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.4 (Heavy Light Special)
item.description:
Don't fear! Axecore Podcast is here!! Here is the very groovy set-list. Rockin' - Law
Yes what he said - luke
1. Decapitated - Spheres Of Madness (5:15) 2. Vader - Silent Empire (4:02) 3. Red Chord - Love On The Concrete (2:57) 4. The Black Dahlia Murder - A Vulgar Picture (3:37) 5. CKY - Close Yet Far (3:53) 6. Manntis - The Ends Where It Begins (2:42) 7. Johnny Cash - Hurt (3:38)
This week we went with a good 20 mins off heavy ass kill your mum music then some chilled out sleepy time tunes enjoy

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.3 (Uber Long Special)
item.description:
Yes the long awaited Axecore ep.3 is out now with 58 mins of me and law talking crap, hope you dudes and gals enjoy it
Heres teh sexy playlist
1. If Hope Dies - Anthem For The Unemployable (3:42) 2. Iron Maiden - Run To The Hills (3:54) 3. Norma Jean - Memphis Will Be Laid to Waste (4:55) 4. Machine Head - The Blood, The Sweat, The Tears (4:15) 5. Ligeia - Dead Man's Bride (3:58) 6. Dragonforce - Revolution Deathsquad (7:52) 7. Bleeding Through - Line in the Sand (4:09) 8. Roadrunner United - Annihilation By The Hands Of God (5:33) 9. As I Lay Dying - The Darkest Nights (3:51)
If you want any songs played or any questions asked, email podcast@axecore.com

item.title: Axecore Podcast - Ep.2 (Cock Up Special)
item.description:
The orginal of this version with Me, Law and Jon got screwed up while i was making it smaller (yes i suck i know) so this week is just some kick ass tunes of my choice dude to Law and John are not around , you wont get me talking either due to i got a killer head ache and would most probes make no sense because I am soooo tired...
Anyways here is this weeks playlist.
1. Caliban - It's Our Burden To Bleed (3:48) 2. August Burns Red - Barbarian (3:45) 3. As I Lay Dying - Through Struggle (3:58) 4. Haste The Day - Walls And Fear (2:49) 5. Heaven Shall Burn - Numbing The Pain (5:36) 6. The Hope of Change - 3501 (4:22) 7. Manntis - Axe Of Redemption (2:43) 8. Sum41- Were All To Blame (3:39) 9. Unearth - Internal War (Live) (3:42) 10. God Forbid - Antihero (3:57)
Click the link on the site bar for all the podcast feed details :wink:
